elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Get to know the Federal Constitution (FC) better by answering the following 20 questions.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: When did the current version come into force?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What words does the preamble use to express support for vulnerable people?
elements.correctAnswer: ... the strength of the people is measured by the welfare of the weak ...

elements.name: question3
elements.title: All cantons are mentioned in Article 1. Why is the canton of Jura mentioned last?
elements.correctAnswer: It is the youngest canton, founded in 1979.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In which article and in which paragraph is it stated that women are equal to men in education and work?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Article 10a lays down the ban on wearing a face covering. When did the ban come into force?

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Get to know the Federal Constitution (FC) better by answering the following 20 questions.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Which article states that primary education is free of charge?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: In which article is it guaranteed that the profession may be freely chosen?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Persons of the third generation of foreigners and stateless children can be naturalized more easily. In which article is this regulated?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Which article stipulates that the cantons must have a democratic constitution?

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Military service is compulsory for Swiss men and voluntary for Swiss women. In which article is this regulated?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Get to know the Federal Constitution (FC) better by answering the following 20 questions.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Which article states that the Confederation, not the cantons, is responsible for vocational education and training?

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Minarets may not be built in Switzerland. Which article states this, and since when has the ban been in force?

elements.name: question13
elements.title: The federal government is responsible for the national roads (freeways). In which article is this responsibility defined?

elements.name: question14
elements.title: Which article stipulates that only the Confederation may issue coins and banknotes?

elements.name: question15
elements.title: August 1 is a paid public holiday. In which article is this regulated?

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Get to know the Federal Constitution (FC) better by answering the following 20 questions.

elements.name: question16
elements.title: The AHV pension is adjusted in line with price trends. Which article states this principle?

elements.name: question17
elements.title: Which article stipulates that employees and employers must each pay half of the unemployment insurance contributions?

elements.name: question18
elements.title: Which article states that the trade in human organs is not permitted?

elements.name: question19
elements.title: If someone is convicted of a sexual offense against children, this person may no longer work in a profession (e.g. as a teacher) in which there is contact with minors or addicts. In which article is this regulated?

elements.name: question20
elements.title: Which article states that the Federal Constitution can be revised at any time?
